thread.title: Manny Pacquiao and Amir Khan confirm negotiations are happening over potential superfight
thread.title_full: Manny Pacquiao and Amir Khan confirm negotiations are happening over potential superfight

author: leeastley
title: Manny Pacquiao and Amir Khan confirm negotiations are happening over potential superfight
text:
Khan gets his Mann Manny Pacquiao and Amir Khan confirm negotiations are happening over potential superfight 
The Fillipino took to Twitter to reveal a bout with the Brit boxer is likely and another announcement will come soon By STUART ATKINS Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments MANNY PACQUIAO and Amir Khan have confirmed negotiations between the former stablemates over a potential showdown are happening. 
Many rumours have been circulating about a possible match up against British boxer Khan for a few months now. Getty Images 7 Manny Pacquiao has revealed he is in talks to fight British boxer Amir Khan for his next fight My team and I are in negotiations with Amir Khan for our next fight. Further announcement coming soon. #TeamPacquiao pic.twitter.com/nW5jpmwVJs 
— Manny Pacquiao (@mannypacquiao) February 23, 2017 
The rumours were brought to an end on Tuesday when Top Rank promoter Bob Arum said that the fight is not happening, saying it’s “Total and complete bulls***”. 
Keep up to date with ALL the latest boxing news, gossip and rumours 
Arum said: “The Amir Khan story has come out of nowhere, what’s happening is that Manny is talking to these people in Dubai who have offered him an insane amount of money. 
“Whether the offer is real or not real — he is determined to explore it to see if it has any validity. 
“That’s all I can say.” Manny Pacquiao defeated Jessy Vargas for the WBO world title last year Amir Khan makes Lahore his next training ground for comeback fight in epic advert 
But today, Pacquiao, 38, has expressed his interest in fighting Khan via twitter saying: "My team and I are in negotiations with Amir Khan for our next fight. 
"Further announcement coming soon." 
And Khan, 30, replied on his Instagram account with a picture of the famous arcade game Pacman. 
He said: "Time to play #Pacman." 
Almost half of the 44,815 that voted picked Khan with Brook in second place with 24%, Crawford 21% and Australian Horn just 7%. Instagram @amirkingkhan Amir Khan also seemed to confirm the talks were ongoing when he posted a picture of the arcade game Pacman with the caption "Time to play Pacman" Action Images Manny Pacquiao and Amir Khan know each other well after training together for years 
The 'Pac-Man' has said he wants a big money bout in the United Arab Emirates. 
But this is unconfirmed at this stage. 
This means Australian Horn's dream fight with future Hall Of Famer Pacquiao is now off. related stories Bout to happen? When is Manny Pacquiao v Amir Khan? Location and possible dates – here’s what we know AMIR'S PRINCESS PARTY Amir Khan's wife Snapchats their daughter's lavish £100,000 second birthday party mega-fight Amir Khan to fight Manny Pacquiao as boxers agree terms over clash in Britain in May PICK of the punch Manny Pacquiao says he wants to fight either Amir Khan, Kell Brook, Terence Crawford or Jeff Horn next.. and asks fans to decide which one BROOK BEATEN Kell Brook agrees to Errol Spence fight with Amir Khan superfight on hold until later this year Reuters 7 Amir Khan last fought when he faced Saul Canelo in Las Vegas 
Horn was a choice that left many boxing fans surprised and disappointed, as this could be Pacquiao's final bout. 
And going out fighting a relatively unknown fighter looked like it wasn't going to capture the imagination of the paying public. 
Arum added: "The Australian deal is not going to happen now because Manny is trying to get a fight done in the United Arab Emirates, the people there favour him fighting Amir Khan." Amir Khan runs up the famous Santa Monica steps in preparation for next bout Action Images Khan has been pushing for a career defining clash with either Pacquiao or Floyd Mayweather for years 
However, this is a fight that will capture the imagination of the boxing world. 
Pacquiao and Khan have sparred many rounds together when they shared the same trainer in Freddie Roach at The Wild Card gym in Los Angles. 
They are both known for their lightning quick hands so this will be a fantastic match up of speed vs speed.
